sentences.en: a stark reminder of life under colonial rule
sentences.cn: 殖民主义统治下生活的严酷见证

sentences.en: All contestants competed stark naked.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛者都一丝不挂地参加比赛。

sentences.en: Dry stone walls may appear stark and lifeless, but they provide a valuable habitat for plants and animals.
sentences.cn: 干燥的石墙看起来也许荒凉且毫无生机，但它们为动植物提供了宝贵的栖息地。

sentences.en: He was stark mad.
sentences.cn: 他完全疯了.

sentences.en: His actions were in stark contrast to his words.
sentences.cn: 他的行动同他说的话形成鲜明的对照.

sentences.en: I think white would be too stark for the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我觉得卧室里用白色未免太素了。

sentences.en: In the cold dawn light, the castle looked stark and forbidding.
sentences.cn: 在寒冷的曙光中，城堡看上去了无生气，令人生畏。

sentences.en: Stark concrete walls have been softened by a show of fresh flowers.
sentences.cn: 鲜花摆上之后，突兀的混凝土墙便显得柔和起来。

sentences.en: That is in stark contrast to the situation during the 1970 oil crisis.
sentences.cn: 那和1970年石油危机时的情形完全不同。

sentences.en: The extreme poverty of the local people is in stark contrast to the wealth of the tourists.
sentences.cn: 当地居民的极度贫困和游客的富裕形成鲜明的对比。

sentences.en: The landscape had a stark, unworldly beauty.
sentences.cn: 那景色有一种简朴、超凡的美。

sentences.en: The movie shows the stark realities of life in the ghetto.
sentences.cn: 这部影片展示了贫民区生活的严酷现实。

sentences.en: The names were traced out in stark black print.
sentences.cn: 这些名字是用醒目的黑体字印出的.

sentences.en: the stark beauty of New Mexico
sentences.cn: 新墨西哥州的荒凉之美

sentences.en: The stark contrast between the haves and have-nots has always existed but in a recession the injustices become more painful.
sentences.cn: 虽然富人和穷人之间一直差距悬殊，但这种不公在经济萧条期愈加显得令人难以接受。

sentences.en: The windows misted, blurring the stark streetlight.
sentences.cn: 窗上蒙了水汽，向外望去，原本突兀的街灯变得模糊起来。

sentences.en: These issues have created a stark fault line within the Peace Process.
sentences.cn: 这些问题显然已成为了和平进程中的薄弱环节。

sentences.en: This stark image will remain etched in the memory of a generation of Berliners.
sentences.cn: 这种荒凉的景象将深深铭刻在一代柏林人的记忆中。

sentences.en: UK companies face a stark choice if they want to stay competitive.
sentences.cn: 英国公司如果想要保持竞争力就不得不面对严峻的选择。

sentences.en: We are faced with a stark choice .
sentences.cn: 我们面临残酷的选择。

sentences.en: When I told her I'd crashed her car, she went stark raving bonkers.
sentences.cn: 我告诉她我把她的车撞坏了时, 她暴跳如雷.
